doc.plot: At 5:32 PM, on the way to pack his belongings from his ex-girlfriend's house, Curtis Lampinen blacks out on the road. When he comes to, there is blood spattered on his shirt, the time is now 5:57, and he has no idea what happened in those twenty-five minutes. When he learns that his ex-girlfriend was murdered in that time span, he is the prime suspect, and seemingly everyone is out to get him, he must find a way to clear his name and unravel the truth, without having any idea what actually happened.
